text.textblock: C. The State Director or designee will cooperate with the State Agency in the development of the Comprehensive Housing Affordability Stategy (CHAS) plan to ensure that, to the extent possible, resources available from FmHA are coordinated with the CHAS plan to maximize the use of housing funds in rural areas. This cooperation may include, but is not limited to, the sharing of Census data and priority point scores throughout the State, providing information on funding levels, preapplications and applications, and rural area designations made by FmHA.
27. 7 CFR chapter XVIII, part 1944, subpart E is amended by revising the words ``District Office'' to read ``servicing office'' in the following places:
b. Section 1944.231 (b), (c)(6), introductory text of (d), and (i)(1)(vi)
